document_data.mainbody:
Draza was a citizen of Port Nyanzaru in Chult during the late 15 century DR.
He had a husband named Belym.
Around the same time as the death curse, Draza was arrested for theft and sentenced to Executioners Run. He and Belym claimed that the arrest was a case of mistaken identity, but were unable to prove his innocence before the time he was to be thrown into the Run with a pair of velociraptors.
